name: 灯織
text: …………くしゅっ
trans: ... Achoo!

name: 咲耶
text:
……おや、灯織じゃないか
お疲れ様
trans:
... My, if it isn't Hiori.
Good to see you.

name: 灯織
text:
あ……咲耶さん
お疲れ様です
trans:
Ah... Sakuya-san.
Good to see you too.

name: 咲耶
text:
外は寒かっただろう
よければ温かい飲み物をいれるよ
trans:
It must've been cold outside.
I'll make something warm to drink if you'd like.

name: 灯織
text:
えっ……
すみません、ありがとうございます……！
trans:
Ehh... 
Sorry, and thank you... !

name: 咲耶
text:
とんでもない
ひとりでのお茶は味気ないと思っていたんだ
trans:
The pleasure is mine.
I was just thinking that having tea by myself 
would be rather dreary.

name: 咲耶
text:
……まぁ、これを飲んだら
自主練に行く予定なのだけれど
trans:
... Well, as soon as I drink this,
I'll be leaving for self-practice, though.

name: 灯織
text: 自主練……ですか
trans: Self-practice... you say.

name: スタッフ
text: ──斑鳩さん、お疲れ様でした
trans: ──Ikaruga-san, thank you for your hard work today.

name: スタッフ
text:
今日、マネージャーさんいらっしゃらないですよね？
タクシー呼びますか？
trans:
Is your manager not with you today?
Shall I call a taxi?

name: ルカ
text: ……いい
trans: ...I'm good.

name: 咲耶
text: 冬季集中レッスン、か
trans: Winter intensive lessons, was it?

name: 灯織
text:
はい、先生が指定してくださったスタジオなんですけど
他の事務所の系列みたいで
trans:
Yes, at another studio that the instructor chose.
I think it's owned by another production office.

name: 咲耶
text: それは刺激的だね
trans: That sounds quite exciting.

name: 灯織
text:
そうなんです。私のレッスンはソロなので
誰かと一緒にはならないんですけど……
trans:
It is. I'm doing solo lessons, so there's 
no one else taking them with me, but...

name: 灯織
text:
廊下とかを通ると、遅くまで本格的なレッスンに
取り組んでいる方が多くて新鮮です
trans:
When I pass through the hallways, I see so many
others practicing what they've learnt intently until
late at night. It's a refreshing experience.

name: 咲耶
text:
なるほど
それで灯織の瞳も、いきいきとしているのかな
trans:
I see.
And that's why your eyes are gleaming with life.

name: 灯織
text: えっ……そうでしょうか？
trans: Huh... Are they really?

name: 灯織
text:
……でも
刺激を受けたことは間違いないです
trans:
... But,
it is true that I feel inspired.

name: ルカ
text: …………くしゅっ
trans: ... Achoo!

name: ルカ
text:
チッ
さみー……
trans:
Tch.
Cold...

name: 灯織
text:
──町内会の火の用心……
確かに、寒くなって乾燥もしてきましたよね
trans:
──Fire safety awareness at the neighborhood 
association... I guess it has gotten quite cold and dry.

name: 咲耶
text: ああ、先日初回の打ち合わせをしてね
trans: Yes, we had our first meeting the other day.

name: 咲耶
text:
凛世と透、小糸と一緒に──
町内会や消防団のみなさんと、担当区域をまわるんだ
trans:
Rinze, Toru and Koito are joining too──
We'll be making rounds in the assigned areas with
the neighborhood association and fire department.

name: 灯織
text:
あれですよね
『火の用心！』って言いながら、木を叩いて歩く……
trans:
It's that thing where you chant "Watch out for
fires", and knock blocks of wood together, right... ?

name: 咲耶
text:
拍子木があれば、
灯織もすぐに参加できそうだね？
trans:
If we had another pair of hyoshigi,
Hiori, could you join us right away?

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、冗談だよ
もちろん、時間が合えば参加は大歓迎だけれど
trans:
Fufu, I'm only joking.
Of course, we'd welcome you with open arms if
your schedule was open.

name: 咲耶
text:
せっかく特別なレッスンを受けているんだ
今はダンスに集中……かな
trans:
But since you're taking special lessons right now,
you should focus on your dancing... I suppose.

name: 灯織
text: ……はい
trans: ... Yes.

name: 灯織
text:
その…………
スタジオに……ちょっとすごい方がいて……
trans:
And, umm... 
At that studio... there's someone quite incredible...

name: 咲耶
text: へぇ？
trans: Oh?

name: 灯織
text: その方にも色々と学ばせてもらってるんです
trans: And I'm learning a lot from her, too.

name: 咲耶
text:
なるほど
先生がふたり、か
trans:
I see.
So you have two instructors.

name: ルカ
text: ……っくしゅ……
trans: ... Hachoo... !

name: 店員
text: あ、えっと……
trans: Uh, excuse me...

name: 店員
text:
お客様、こちらのタオル
プレゼント用のラッピングはいたしますか？
trans:
Would you like me to
gift wrap this towel for you, Miss?

name: ルカ
text:
あー……
いいです
trans:
Aah... 
It's fine.

name: ルカ
text: 自分用なんで
trans: I bought it for myself.

name: 灯織
text:
……いつも、自分を自分以上に見せてくれる人たちに 
囲まれているんだなって──
trans:
... It feels like, I'm always surrounded by people who
make me think I'm better than I really am──

name: 灯織
text: あそこに行くたびに思うんです
trans: I've come to think that whenever I go there.

name: 咲耶
text:
…………
それは……灯織の視野が広がった、ということかな
trans:
...... 
Perhaps... that's because you're broadening your
horizons, Hiori.

name: 灯織
text:
……
そうだったらいいんですけど……
trans:
...... 
It'd be great if that were the case...

name: 咲耶
text: ……私はそう思うよ
trans: ... That's how it seems to me.

name: 咲耶
text:
……──ああ、話していると興味が湧いてばかりだね
灯織が、どんなレッスンやアドバイスを受けたのか
trans:
... ──Ahh, all this talk has really piqued my interest.
I wonder what kind of lessons and advice you're
receiving.

name: 咲耶
text: 少し教えてもらえないだろうか
trans: Would you mind teaching them to me too?

name: 咲耶
text:
都合がいい時があれば、でかまわない
よかったら、自主練に付き合ってほしい
trans:
Only when you are free, of course.
If it's alright with you, I'd like you to join me during
my own practice sometime.

name: 灯織
text:
上手く伝えられるかはわからないですけど……
ぜひ……！
trans:
I don't know if I can relay them very well, but...
certainly... !

name: ルカ
text: …………くしゅっ
trans: ... choo!

name: ルカ
text: あー……クソ
trans: Argh... dammit.
